name: Queer-doom-virutal-campus-
body:
![](http://s28.postimg.org/wrocpbl2l/11401255_983392698359138_231400338506982425_n.jpg)
Welcome to official NSU virutal campus simulator app.
THis is a unity 3D engine based virtual campus app that works in all mobile platforms. We have used technologies like:
Google Sketchup
3D max and maya
motion track via kinect
This technologies helped us to create exact replica of actual campus of North South University.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
